pullRequest.title: [KOGITO-858] Add a Decision Table RuleUnit example
pullRequest.bodyText:
decisiontable-quarkus-example and decisiontable-springboot-example.
Please review, thanks!

nodes.bodyText: it's probably better for now to remove these tests against the programmatic APIs, as 1) they duplicate the http tests 2) they test an API that is still not stable nor public 3) they pose some problems when we use the quarkus extension instead of the maven plugin (basically they break the build because unfortunately the extension runs after the tests, in the package phase...)
let's remove it from here too, to avoid confusion

beforeCommit.message: [KOGITO-858] Add a Decision Table RuleUnit example

afterCommit.message: [KOGITO-858] Add a Decision Table RuleUnit example

nodes.bodyText: you should be able to get rid of this plugin and use quarkus-smallrye-openapi instead :)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,137 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project>
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+    <artifactId>kogito-examples</artifactId>
+    <version>8.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+  <groupId>org.kie.kogito.examples</groupId>
+  <artifactId>decisiontable-quarkus-example</artifactId>
+  <name>Kogito Example :: Decision Table - Quarkus</name>
+
+  <properties>
+    <version.surefire>2.22.1</version.surefire>
+  </properties>
+
+  <build>
+    <plugins>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+        <artifactId>quarkus-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+        <version>${version.io.quarkus}</version>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>build</goal>
+            </goals>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <groupId>io.openapitools.swagger</groupId>
+        <artifactId>swagger-maven-plugin</artifactId>
